noCoursesFoundMessage: You haven't created any courses yet.

courseDeletedMessage: The course has been successfully removed.
courseDeletionErrorMessage: Could not delete the course. Please try again.

name: Name
noUsersYet: There are no users on the platform yet.
editRoleDescription: Changing a user's role can significantly affect their permissions.
deleteUserConfirmationTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
deleteUserConfirmationMessage: This will permanently delete the user {{name}} and all associated data. This action is irreversible.
adminNotConnected: Administrator not authenticated. Please log in again.
deleteErrorMessage: An unknown error occurred during deletion.
reviewApplicationsDescription: Review and decide on new instructor applications.
rejectionTemplateQuality: Hello, thank you for your application. After review, we noticed that the audio/video quality of your presentation does not meet our platform's standards. We invite you to resubmit with improved quality.
rejectionTemplateTopic: Hello, thank you for your application. The proposed course topic is not currently aligned with our content strategy. We encourage you to propose another topic.
rejectionTemplateIncomplete: Hello, your application is incomplete. Please provide all the required information, including social links and a presentation video, to be considered.
rejectionTemplateGeneric: Hello, thank you for your interest in FormaAfrique. After careful review, we regret to inform you that we cannot proceed with your application at this time. We wish you the best in your future endeavors.
acceptanceTemplate: Congratulations! Your instructor application has been approved. Welcome to the FormaAfrique team! You can now access the instructor dashboard to start creating your courses. We look forward to seeing what you create.
applicationApprovedMessage: The instructor has been approved and notified.
applicationRejectedMessage: The application has been rejected. The user has been set back to student role.
moderationDescription: Review courses submitted by instructors before they go live.
pendingCoursesDescription: These courses are waiting for your approval to be published.
courseApprovedMessage: The course is now published and live on the platform.
noPendingCoursesMessage: There are no courses waiting for review.
transactionsDescription: Browse and search through all transactions on the platform.
transactionsSearchDescription: A record of all successful sales and refunds.
searchPlaceholder: Search by buyer, email, or transaction ID...
firestoreIndexError: An error occurred loading transactions. A Firestore index might be missing.
noTransactionsYet: There have been no transactions on the platform yet.
payoutsManagementDescription: Manage and validate withdrawal requests from instructors.
payoutMarkedAs: The payout has been marked as {{status}}.
marketingDescription: Use AI to generate promotional content and manage discounts.
mktExamples: Use simple prompts like "Create a 25% promo code for Black Friday" or "Write an announcement for a new Python course".
prompt_label: What do you want to create or announce?
aiRequestProcessed: Your request has been processed by Mathias.
aiRequestError: Something went wrong while communicating with the AI.
promoUpdateError: Failed to update promo code status.
